title: Salmon and cream cheese crepes
ingredients: ['For the crepes', '45g plain flour', '1 egg', '125ml milk', '1 pinch salt', 'butter, for frying', 'For the filling', '150g cream cheese, at room temperature', 'a few spring onions, finely sliced', '1/2 tablespoon lemon juice', '200g smoked salmon, thinly sliced']
